"ARKS Ship":
"A large crystalline entity known as an
\"Angel\" has appeared in the ARKS Ship
Urban District. It's attempting to breach
the ship's main reactor. If it succeeds,
it could cause a devastating explosion.
All ARKS, board A.I.S. and work with
Evangelion Unit-01 to destroy the Angel.
――――――――――――――――――――
Destroy the target to clear"

"Now commencing the operation to destroy the Angel.
All ARKS are to board A.I.S. Vega and sortie against the invader."
"Once you're in the air, work with the support turrets to draw the target's attention away from Eva-01."
"We expect a powerful response from the target, but you have to survive until the Positron Rifle is fully charged. Good luck!"
